title: Offcloud makes site unlocking and file downloads a breeze, now only $39.99
content:
Macworld

Whether the information you need is a file in someone’s Google Drive or Dropbox, a video posted to YouTube, a song on SoundCloud, or even via a file-sharing platform like BitTorrent, Offcloud is the universal upload and download manager that can save, sync, share, and even unlock content, all without compromising your security. Now, lifetime access to Offcloud is under $40.

Enjoy Offcloud’s intuitive interface as you go about unlocking file-hosting and streaming sites. Want to watch a show that isn’t available in your country? Offcloud can unlock nearly every type of restriction, all while keeping your device anonymous. 

Offcloud also has Zapier integration, meaning you can automatically upload or sync anything to Google Drive, Dropbox, Amazon Cloud Drive, and Microsoft OneDrive. Users can even sync to NAS (Network Attached Storage), FTP (File Transfer Protocol), or WebDAV (Web-based Distributed Authoring and Versioning).

This subscription also allows users to back up almost any YouTube video, convert Soundcloud files to MP3, remote cloud syncs, PDF conversion of entire sites, access to impressive API, and much more. In addition, users can enjoy unlimited link generation, premium file hosting sites, and even 1TB of proxy bandwidth and 50GB of cloud space.

Grab lifetime access to Offcloud for just $39.99, the best price you’ll find online.
